I'd highly recommend watching "Kundun" if you're in the mood for a captivating and historically significant film. This movie chronicles the life of Tibet's 14th Dalai Lama, offering an insightful portrayal of his journey against Chinese oppression.

Another interesting choice is "Tomorrow Never Dies," which features the iconic James Bond character, as he navigates a plot to induce a war between China and the United Kingdom. The action-packed thriller stars Pierce Brosnan as Bond, along with an impressive ensemble cast. Enjoy your cinematic journey!
